item.description:
Spiritual Awakening and Divine Openings with Judy
Third Thursday of Every Month 7-9 PM $30

Dear Meditators!
Join us for an evening of radiant bliss with sacred ceremony, chakra meditation, light discussions and Divine Openings
"I just want you to know I feel incredible! The energy I so powerful and the sense of expansion is remarkable! Thank you for introducing me to this!" -Sylvia"
"Well that was pretty special last night. Thank you so much for offering these Divine Openings; working my way through the book alone was, well, lonely...so I am delighted to have a community of kindred spirits to share parts of the journey with."- Pat

This program is for anyone interested in accessing and sustaining higher consciousness. We will begin in silence then you'll receive a guided meditation. Light sharing about our awakening process will be uplifting! You will receive two or three Divine Openings and learn about ways to open and sustain freedom through higher vibrations.
    Divine Openings is an enlightenment activation. No matter where you are on your path of awakening, you will love this sacred way of being in divine energy! Whatever you want next in life, this program will help you achieve it with ease and grace. The Divine Presence becomes apparent as divine love and joy.
     At our meetings we can freely express and connect with like-hearted souls as we share in these powerful energy transmissions.  The book by Lola Jones Everything is Going Great in my Absence is available through Judy and will be an inspiration at home.  Judy teaches from her ongoing deep studies and experience in the area of conscious awakening. All are welcome to share experiences of your personal awakening process!

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: Spiritual awakening and Divine Openings
